Articles.Content:
![audVbJ8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/audVbJ8.jpg)

This stock craft has ~60kdV on the pad. 

Its very useable. I just took a Kerbal from the pad to a Jool 200km orbit in 45 days. 

It has the big lifter section and then combined nuclear/ion/rocket transfer stages that will get you up to 0.02% the speed of light. 

Craft file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/xd4dkol0sxbmsl3/Fast%20to%20Jool%206.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xd4dkol0sxbmsl3/Fast%20to%20Jool%206.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T11:26:58Z" title="04/01/2015 11:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by Foxster**

"hochzeitstorte"? Do speak German or did you use Google translator?

Nice craft by the way.

> 
> "hochzeitstorte"? Do speak German or did you use Google translator?
> Nice craft by the way.

I barely speak my native English, so no, I had to resort to Google Translate. I hope I got the right word.
Looks a bit more like one here...

![bnT6sQQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/bnT6sQQ.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T11:34:24Z" title="04/01/2015 11:34  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by Foxster**
